Features.GPS.Command.Description.Default: Shows your current position within the world.
Features.GPS.Command.Description.Broadca: Broadcast your current location to the server.
Features.GPS.Command.Description.Clipboa: Copy your current location to the clipboard.
Features.GPS.Command.Description.Private: Send your current location to another player.
Features.GPS.FuzzyPlayerSearch.MultipleR: Multiple players found with the same name.
